Assassin

The Assassin is the Rogue's subclass in Remixed Dungeon.

Unlocking

The Assassin subclass can be unlocked by using a Tome of Mastery after defeating the second boss (Tengu).

Special Mechanics

When performing a surprise attack, the _Assassin_ inflicts additional damage to his target.

Special Armor

Using an Armor Kit on any armor will transform it into the Assassin Armor, which is specifically designed for this subclass.

Advantages

  • Bonus damage on surprise attacks
  • Effective for stealth-based gameplay
  • High damage potential when enemies are unaware
  • Synergizes well with invisible or out-of-sight attacks

Disadvantages

  • Only effective on surprise attacks
  • Requires careful positioning and stealth
  • Less effective in direct confrontation situations
